queries.description: Containers should not have CAP_SYS_ADMIN Linux capability

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=enforcer should not use CAP_SYS_ADMIN Linux capability
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=enforcer uses CAP_SYS_ADMIN Linux capability

queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/containers' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/containers' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/dev' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/dev' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/aquasec/data' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/aquasec/data' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/etc' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/etc' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/aquasec/audit' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/aquasec/audit' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/aquasec/tmp' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/aquasec/tmp' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/proc' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/proc' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/sys' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/sys' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/aquasec' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/aquasec' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/run' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/run' mounted

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation is undefined

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cluster-role}}.rules[1].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-cluster-role}}.rules[1].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.description: Container should not share the host process ID namespace

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.hostPID' should be set to false or undefined
files.actual_value: 'spec.template.spec.hostPID' is true

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.volumeMounts.name={{dev}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.volumeMounts.name={{dev}}.readOnly is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.volumeMounts.name={{var-run}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.volumeMounts.name={{var-run}}.readOnly is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.volumeMounts.name={{containers}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.volumeMounts.name={{containers}}.readOnly is undefined

queries.query_name: Workload Mounting With Sensitive OS Directory
queries.description: Workload is mounting a volume with sensitive OS Directory

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/aquasec/data' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/aquasec/data' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/etc' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/etc' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/aquasec' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/aquasec' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/aquasec/audit' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/aquasec/audit' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/run' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/run' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/dev' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/dev' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/sys' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/sys' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/containers' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/containers' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/proc' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/proc' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/aquasec/tmp' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-ds' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/aquasec/tmp' with hostPath

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.securityContext.runAsUser is 0 and 'runAsNonRoot' is false

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.securityContext.runAsUser is undefined

queries.description: Containers should not have extra capabilities allowed

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.resources.limits.memory is undefined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.resources.requests.memory is undefined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop is undefined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=enforcer has limits defined
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=enforcer doesn't have limits defined

queries.description: CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=enforcer.resources should have requests defined
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=enforcer.resources doesn't have requests defined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations[container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/enforcer] should be set to 'runtime/default' or 'localhost'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations[container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/enforcer] does not specify a valid AppArmor profile

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: spec.containers[enforcer].securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
files.actual_value: spec.containers[enforcer].securityContext.capabilities.drop is not defined

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-ds}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is undefined

queries.description: Container should not use secrets as environment variables

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.env.name={{AQUA_TOKEN}}.valueFrom.secretKeyRef' should be undefined
files.actual_value: 'spec.template.spec.containers.name={{enforcer}}.env.name={{AQUA_TOKEN}}.valueFrom.secretKeyRef' is defined
